title: BUY/SELL/WHY -- Sept 2019
text: On a down day, adding to KNOP. Intend as a long-term hold. Can't find anything I don't like about this shuttle tanker MLP. 11.2% well-covered qualified distribution (1.45 coverage). Fleet is 100% utilized in a tight supply & demand scenario with long term contracts. Rates are stable throughout oil price fluctuations. Ample cash on hand. The GP, KNOT, seems to behave sensibly and conservatively (as far as I can tell). Slowly adding vessels and reducing debt on schedule. Share price is near the low end of its three-year history. However, in going through their most recent earnings transcript, there are items which are above my paygrade, so if anyone sees any red flags in my thinking, I'd appreciate a good head-slap.
description: As usual, post your recent trades with a brief explanation of your reasoning. Readers may post brief questions, but if a longer discussion is in order, - 20591
